title: Savory Cheese & Vegetable Stuffed Paratha
ingredients: 1/2 cup grated paneer cheese (Indian cottage cheese)
2 tablespoons oil or ghee for cooking
instructions: In a large bowl, combine flour, salt, turmeric, and chili powder.
Gradually add water and knead into a soft dough. Cover and let rest for 15 minutes.
In a pan, heat 1 tablespoon oil and sauté onion and bell pepper until softened.
Add spinach and cook until wilted. Remove from heat and let cool slightly.
Mix the cooked vegetables with grated paneer.
Divide the dough into 1 equal portion. Roll each portion into a thin circle.
Place a portion of the cheese and vegetable mixture in the center of each circle.
Bring the edges of the dough together to enclose the filling and flatten slightly.
Heat oil or ghee on a griddle or tawa. Cook the paratha on medium heat, flipping occasionally, until golden brown and cooked through.
Serve hot with yogurt or chutney (optional, but recommended).
description: A delicious fusion breakfast combining the flaky goodness of Indian paratha with a savory American-inspired cheese and vegetable filling. This satisfying dish offers a unique blend of flavors and textures, perfect for a hearty morning meal.
